scripts.dependencies: cd front && rm -f package-lock.json && npm i && cd .. && cd back && rm -f package-lock.json && npm i && cd ..
scripts.update: cd front && npm update && cd .. && cd back && npm update && cd ..
scripts.audit: cd front && npm audit fix && cd .. && cd back && npm audit fix && cd ..
scripts.build: cd front && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.push: git add -A && git commit -m 'Update' && git push -u origin master
scripts.edit: git checkout . && git remote update && git pull
